sourcesContent:
import "./current-weather.css"; import { getWeatherIconUrl } from '../../utils'; // Correct import path const CurrentWeather = ({ data }) => { if (!data || !data.weather) { return
No weather data available
; } // Use the utility function to get the weather icon URL const iconUrl = getWeatherIconUrl(data.weather[0].icon); return (

{data.city}

{data.weather[0].description}

{Math.round(data.main.temp)}°C

Details
Feels like {Math.round(data.main.feels_like)}°C
Wind {data.wind.speed} m/s
Humidity {data.main.humidity}%
Pressure {data.main.pressure} hPa
); }; export default CurrentWeather;
